hero.title: Help & FAQ
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CrookCatcher

notTakingPictures.question: CrookCatcher is not taking pictures
notTakingPictures.answer:
• If you are testing CrookCatcher, note that android only detects a password or pattern as incorrect if it has at least 4 digits/characters or pattern dots.
  • Your phone manufacturer might have imposed further battery optimizing restrictions on CrookCatcher, preventing it from working in the background. To solve the issue please follow instructions for your device on www.dontkillmyapp.com.

eraseData.question: Will CrookCatcher erase all my phone or tablet's data if too many incorrect passwords are typed?
eraseData.answer: No. CrookCatcher will never erase your device's data.

gmailAccess.question: Why does CrookCatcher need access to my gmail account?
gmailAccess.answer: Unlike other security applications, CrookCatcher does not rely on a third-party server for sending emails. Privacy is important, so CrookCatcher instead uses Google's authorization system OAuth2.0 to safely send emails directly from your device. This will not give CrookCatcher access to your email addresses or contacts. CrookCatcher will only use this permission to send security alert emails from your Gmail account to the email address defined by you from within the app.

forgotPassword.question: I forgot my password, pin code or pattern lock.
forgotPassword.answer: The lock screen, and the password that is associated with, is not a part of CrookCatcher. If you have forgotten your password, pin code or pattern refer to your device's user manual.

purchasedPro.question: Already purchased pro?
purchasedPro.answer: If you already purchased pro but it is not showing in the app, please make sure that you are logged into your device with the same google account that you used for purchasing and then click the restore button on the config page of CrookCatcher.

revokeAccess.question: How to revoke CrookCatcher's access to gmail or drive?
revokeAccess.answer: Open Google Account Settings and select CrookCatcher from the list. Then scroll to the bottom and select delete connections.

reboot.question: Not working after reboot?
reboot.answer: Due to Android security precautions, your phone must be unlocked once after reboot for CrookCatcher to access the camera. I wish I could fix this, but unfortunately there is nothing I can do about it.

payment.question: Payment problems
payment.answer: Having payment issues? Many problems are addressed in the Google Play Payments Help Center.

internet.question: Does CrookCatcher need internet?
internet.answer: CrookCatcher works offline to detect unauthorized unlock attempts and capture data. An internet connection is however required to send alert emails. Due to Android restrictions, CrookCatcher sadly cannot automatically turn on and off data or Wi-Fi when needed.

privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy for CrookCatcher, the Android app that takes pictures when wrong passwords are entered.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: By using CrookCatcher, you agree to the following policy:

camera.title: Camera
items: CrookCatcher uses the camera permission to take pictures and record videos when a wrong password, PIN code, or lock pattern is entered, based on the number of attempts you specify in the app's settings under the 'Failed Unlock' preference.
CrookCatcher will not take pictures or record videos at any other times, unless other specific features have been enabled by you in the app.

Pictures and videos are emailed to you if the email function is enabled in CrookCatcher's settings. See the Email section below for more details. Pictures and videos may also be uploaded to Google Drive if enabled by you.
Otherwise, pictures and videos are stored only on your device and are not shared with the developer or any third party.

location.title: Location
items: If enabled in the settings, CrookCatcher finds your device's location in the background when it takes a picture.
CrookCatcher will not access your location at any other time.
The location is saved with the picture and emailed to you if the email function is enabled.
Your location data is not shared with the developer or any third party.

microphone.title: Microphone
items: When video recording is enabled, CrookCatcher will access the microphone to record videos.
Microphone access is only granted when you enable this feature and is only used for recording videos.

email.title: Email
items: CrookCatcher asks you to sign in with your Gmail account and grant permission to 'send emails on your behalf'. This avoids sending sensitive data through third-party servers. To revoke this permission, visit https://myaccount.google.com/permissions.
This does not grant CrookCatcher access to read your emails, manage contacts, or perform other actions.
Emails are only sent to the address specified in the 'Send email to' setting and only when specific conditions are met, which you specify in the app.
You can always see in your Gmail account which emails CrookCatcher has sent.
Your email address is not shared with the developer or any third party.

analytics.title: Usage Statistics and Crash Reports
analytics.content: CrookCatcher tracks anonymous usage data and crash reports using Firebase Analytics to improve performance and fix bugs. You can opt out by unticking an option at the bottom of the settings menu in CrookCatcher.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We value your trust and are committed to protecting your data. All collected data is stored securely on your device or sent directly to you via email if enabled. No personal data is transmitted to any third party for advertising or other purposes.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: This privacy policy applies to the most recent version of CrookCatcher. We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. You're advised to review this page periodically for any changes. Changes are effective immediately after they're posted on this page.

footer.dataUsage: Data is used solely to enable CrookCatcher to function and improve. No personal data is transmitted to any third party for advertising or any other purpose.
footer.compliance: CrookCatcher complies with the Official User Data Policy for Google API Services.
